original: Crevis is the leading name in high-tech outdoor wear at extortionate prices. Don't take out a second mortgage to buy a Crevis fleece when Designer Slave has passable copies in wool. Itch like a meth addict for just $40!
translated: Crevis是天价高科技户外服饰的领头羊。能在跳楼大甩卖买到过得去的山寨款，就别二次贷款购买正品的Crevis羊毛衫了。体验蚂蚁爬满全身的感觉，只要$40！
